Description: Part of a limestone tomb-relief: bearing sunk relief decoration including part of the body of an offering-bearer and two libation-vases. On the other surface are two incense-stands.
Curator's comments: Bibliography: The British Museum, 'A guide to the Egyptian galleries (Sculpture)' (London, 1909), 15.
Bibliographic references: James 1961 / Hieroglyphic texts from Egyptian stelae, etc. Part 1 (pl.15)
